obsidianTraits.generalDescription: Obsidians are one of the lowest Colors in the Society hierarchy, genetically engineered to be massive warriors. They live on the polar regions of planets, particularly Mars and Earth, and have been conditioned to worship the Golds as gods. They are characterized by their enormous size (typically 7-9 feet tall), pale white skin adapted to arctic conditions, white-blonde or platinum hair, pale blue or grey eyes, and heavily muscular builds.

culturalElements.tattoos: Ritual facial and body tattoos in dark ink are common, denoting clan, status, and achievements
culturalElements.hair: Uncut hair (being 'unshorn') is a mark of an undefeated warrior; cutting hair represents defeat or shame
culturalElements.weapons: Traditional weapons include massive axes, war hammers, and oversized blades; they also adapt to razors in the modern era
culturalElements.religion: Traditionally worship Golds as gods, though this changes during the Rising
